In England, in the seven days to 12 August, there were 172,785 new confirmed cases (305.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 August, there were 165,401 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 4% (7,384 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 August is 5,521,231 (9,763.4 cases per 100,000 population).
